entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal] Allow overriding the log level in IHttpLoggingInterceptor #56126
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56125
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #56124
  • improve .net documentation #56121
  • Updating Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly from 8.0.5 to 8.0.6 breaks Blazor Webassembly application #56119
  • Add an option to enforce case-sensitive URLs #56118
  • RedirectToRoute with default action doesn't include action in URL. #56117
  • ASP0022 - False positive without using intermediate variables with groups #56115
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] with IFormFileCollection in .NET 8 Minimal APIs #56114
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #56113
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #56112
  • Identity based authentication using OpenIdConnect #56108

Closed

  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod to src/Middleware/CORS/src/Infrastructure/CorsConstants.cs #54772
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, json_middleware #56014
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, single_query #56073
  • Class level validation custom attribute is not supported. #50962
  • onClose callback not getting initiated when token expires #56110
  • onClose callback not getting initiated when token expires #56109
  • Unintended localization for DateTime strings #56053
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https, json #56089
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #56099
  • blazor: "Cannot submit the form 'create' because no form on the page currently has that name." Error occurs on submit of a form generated by blazor #55893

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56123
    area-infrastructure
  • SE.Redis DC backend / HybridCache : add net8.0 TFM #56122
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Updating the SDK to a version that contains the fingerprinting work #56120
    area-infrastructure
  • ASP0022 - Fix false positive for groups without using intermediate variables #56116
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update Components build and E2E testing instructions #56106
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 9.0-preview6
  • Update sdk daily builds table url #56085
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Remove dot that is added to URL #56075
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Retry CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser #55955
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Move Weather page to the Blazor Web Client project when using WebAssembly-based interactivity #55877
    area-blazor
  • Add support for OpenAPI schema transformers #56093
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT
  • Fix Build From Source example #56105
    area-infrastructure
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
